items.sentence: Why did you choose this spot to build your house?
Mary said she didn\'t want to work as a waitress.
Mary was the most beautiful girl at Tom\'s party.
Tom isn\'t the one who convinced Mary to do that.
Are you quite sure it was Tom you saw doing that?
Tom isn\'t the one who showed Mary around Boston.
Tom isn\'t the only one here that is from Boston.
Tom taught Mary everything he knew about fishing.
Tom took a lot of pictures when he was in Boston.
Didn\'t you know Tom used to be a French teacher?
